display.title: Powered Spawner
display.description:
Spawn mobs with the power of RF!

Broken spawners can be acquired by breaking a vanilla Minecraft Spawner. Initially, a broken spawner will have the mob type of the original spawner block, but the mob type can be changed by combining it with a Soul Vial of the desired type in a Soul Binder, which allow spawners to spawn creatures that do not have normal spawner blocks
